#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;int tot,m,w,c,mb=0,wb=0,cb=0,sum=0;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
mb=0,wb=0,cb=0,sum=0;                        
    scanf("%d%d%d%d",&tot,&m,&w,&c);
    if(m==0)
    {
    printf("%d %d %d\n",mb,wb,cb);
}
else
{
    while(1)
    {
            if(m>=1 && w>=2 && c>=12 && (sum+15)<=tot)
            {
                    mb++;
                    wb=wb+2;
                    cb=cb+12;
                    sum=sum+15;
                    m--;
                    w=w-2;
                    c=c-12;
                    
                    
            }
            else break;
    }
                    
    while(sum!=tot)
    {
                   if((ceil(((double)cb+1.0)/4.0) <=(mb+wb))&&(c!=0))
                   {
                   c--;
                                  cb++;
                   }
                   else if((ceil(((double)wb+1.0)/2.0) <=(mb))&&(w!=0))
                   {
                        wb++;
                        w--;
                   }
                   else if(m!=0)
                   {
                       mb++;
                       m--;
                   }
                   else
                   break;
                  sum++;              
    }
    printf("%d %d %d\n",mb,wb,cb);
}}
}
